name: py-pybigwig

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: numpy
variants.description: Enable support for numpy integers and vectors

description: A package for accessing bigWig files using libBigWig.

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-crossmap
dependent_to.description:
CrossMap is a program for convenient conversion of genome coordinates
(or annotation files) between different assemblies

dependent_to.name: py-rseqc
dependent_to.description:
RSeQC package provides a number of useful modules that can
comprehensively evaluate high throughput sequence data especially RNA-
seq data.

dependent_to.name: py-deeptools
dependent_to.description:
deepTools addresses the challenge of handling the large amounts of data
that are now routinely generated from DNA sequencing centers.
